description:
Take part in the lottery and embark on the vacation of your life alongside your best friend: Yuina, where you'll also be a judge in a beauty contest. On the island you will be joined by the competitors – the artistic Eimiko, serious and elegant Haru, commanding Tomoe, and flirty Aimi. Get your flirt game on, the competition starts now!


WHAT IS THEIR SECRET?
While spending time with the girls, you'll notice their weird behavior. Are they hiding something from you? Why did you specifically win the competition? Does it have to do with your memory loss?


LET THEM CHARM YOU
During your stay on the island, you'll have the opportunity to spend time with each of the girls. Get to know their stories and personalities better during various activities such as jogging or swimming. They might try to bribe you and play unfairly… but that can stay just between you and them. Will you keep their secrets?


ONLY ONE WINNER
Despite the beauty and charm of all the girls, only one will be able to win the competition. Which one of them will impress you enough to award her the golden apple? Are you going to go with your heart or will you play fair?

And most importantly: will you find love in Love Elysium?

KEY FEATURES:
- An amazing story waiting for you
- 5 endings to discover = 5x more gameplay
- Unique personalities and temperaments of the girls
- Many dialogue options you can choose from
- Breathtaking island full of magical places
- Different reactions of girls depending on what you say
name: Love Elysium: Secret of the Goddess
